name: Affe's Death Counter
description:
Affe's Death Counter mod for tModLoader: Displays the total number of deaths with customizable options for a personalized gaming experience. Keep track of your deaths with additional settings and detailed statistics.

The "affe's Death Counter" modification is designed for the game Terraria using the tModLoader platform. This mod allows players to track their total number of deaths in the game, offering customizable settings to create a unique gaming experience.

The main functions:
Death counter display: Users can see their death counter under the map/health interface or as a pop-up text.
Text settings: The ability to adjust the text size, its position on the screen, and also lock the display position.
Toggle the visibility of the death counter: The death count can be displayed as part of the UI or as text bubbles. This function can be switched.
Easy to add and remove: The mod can be added or removed at any time without interrupting the gameplay.
Cause of Death Tracking: Viewing detailed information about the causes of deaths in the game is available via a hotkey, providing more detailed information about your deaths.

Additional features:
Displaying the death counter with information accessories: Option to display death counter with accessories like Tally Counter or better (including REK 3000, PDA, Cell Phone, Shellphone), which can be toggled in settings.

name: Angler Shops Alternative
description:
"Angler Shops Alternative" is a unique modification for tModLoader that expands the capabilities of the NPC Angler in Terraria by adding two new shops with a variety of items.

“Angler Shops Alternative” is a modification based on the original “Angler Shop” mod. It offers players more flexibility and options by adding two new shops for the NPC Angler. These shops include many items that were previously only available through completing quests, such as the Fishing Bobbler, Bottomless Bucket of Honey, Honey Absorbing Sponge, and other quest rewards.

Features:
Two shops for NPC Angler: This allows you to add missing items including the Fishing Bobbler, Bottomless Honey Bucket, Honey Absorbing Sponge, and other quest rewards.
Blocking some items behind bosses: The mod adds the option to block some items behind bosses in the Mod configuration.
Dialogue Panel Rework Mod Compatibility: Fully compatible with the Dialogue Panel Rework mod.
Setting up a custom currency: When enabled in the mod configuration, a custom currency (Angler coins) will be enabled for two Angler stores.

name: Microdungeons And More — A Worldgen
description:
“Microdungeons And More - A Worldgen Mod” is a modification for tModLoader that enriches the world of Terraria with new structures and world generation elements, making each playthrough unique.

“Microdungeons And More - A Worldgen Mod” is a JustImpaxim creation for tModLoader that brings new elements and structures to Terraria, making each game more exciting.

Current content:
Plains/Canyons: Deep chasms that cut through the surface and extend deep into the earth.
Ice Fortresses: Micro-dungeons full of treasures and traps hidden in icy biomes.
Abandoned Hellevators: Vertical structures found underground.
Underground Lakes: Vast bodies of water that can be found underground.
Golden Lake: An underground lake filled with honey and gold.
Punished Church: A micro-dungeon generated in Hell.

name: Fast Fall
description:
"Transform your Terraria experience with the Fast Fall Mod! Add the ability to quickly fall down by pressing the DOWN button, like in many other 2D platformers. Highly customizable and easy to use."

Fast Fall is a simple but effective modification for Terraria that adds the ability to quickly fall down, like many other 2D platformers. This feature makes movement through the world more fluid and dynamic, allowing players to quickly move between levels and overcome obstacles without unnecessary effort.

Features:
Fast fall: Simply press the DOWN button to instantly speed up your descent, allowing you to quickly progress through the world of Terraria.
Highly customizable: The modification offers a wide range of settings, allowing players to adjust the speed and other parameters of the fast fall to suit their individual preferences.

name: InfraSonic (tVoice)
description:
"InfraSonic" is an innovative modification for Terraria that offers a unique opportunity to communicate directly in the game without the need to use third-party programs. With InfraSonic, you can interact harmoniously with your friends, share strategies and coordinate actions without being distracted from the gameplay.

Features:
Basic voice chat: Similar to the features available in CSGO, InfraSonic provides an easy and reliable way to communicate within the game.
Positional effect: Player voices will be spatially positioned, adding realism and depth to your interactions in the world of Terraria.

Benefits of use:
Automatically lower the background music volume: Background Music Ducking automatically reduces the volume of background music during calls, ensuring clear and understandable conversations.
Dynamic sound attenuation: Players' voices will be adjusted based on the distance between them, creating a surprisingly realistic gaming atmosphere.

name: Custom Zone Titles
description:
Extend the functionality of Biome Titles with the "Custom Zone Titles" modification for tModLoader, allowing you to assign unique titles to zones of your choice. Create your own titles and personalize your Terraria world!

Custom Zone Titles are an integral addition to Biome Titles, allowing you to create unique, custom-titled zones in your Terraria world.

Features:
Assigning titles to zones: Now you can easily create and name zones in your world. Highlight important places or buildings by giving them unique titles.
Intuitive interface: Creating and editing zones is carried out using a convenient interface that does not require much effort. Just drag, click and enjoy your personalized zones.
Resourceless creation: You don't need any additional resources to create zones. Just use the workbench and your ideas!

name: JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation
description:
JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation (Generation from JereTheJuggler) is a mod for tModLoader, which enriches the world generation process in Terraria.

Unique structures: The mod adds a variety of structures, ranging from small cosmetic changes to full-fledged new objects that will help you progress through the game.
Diversity: You'll find everything here - from underground traps to huge bones and abandoned mines.
Integration with vanilla blocks: The mod uses only vanilla blocks and items, which allows you to preserve the atmosphere of Terraria.
Setting: You can turn each feature on and off through the in-game settings menu.

Here are some of the implemented features:
Hanging Spiked Traps: New traps hidden in dungeons.
Towers in snow biomes: Small towers protecting snow biomes.
Giant worm teeth: Teeth protruding from walls in the Blackness.
Giant Bones: Shattered bones in the Red biome.
Additional Gems: Risky opportunities to get extra jewelry.
Abandoned mines: Huge mines in the depths of the cave layer.
piers: Piers for fishing on the ocean.
Flower biome: Flower fertilizer has brought results.
Custom rails for minecarts: Are you ready for an adrenaline rush?
Hell's houses: Because hell hasn't been evil enough yet.
JereTheJuggler's Custom Generation - a great way to make the world of Terraria more unique and interesting!

name: Thorium + Calamity Convergence REDUX
description:
Thorium + Calamity Convergence Mod REDUX is a mod for tModLoader, which combines two popular mods: Thorium + Calamity.

Improved Progression: The mod reduces the redundancy that occurs when both mods do essentially the same thing. There are now new recipe trees, sometimes even completely new recipes for items. And finally there are no identical recipes for vertebrae and skin!
Combination of Classes: Class progression has been revised. For example, Angel Threads are now available after Plantera, and Terrarium Particle Sprinters и Seraph Tracers enter into the normal progression.
Authors: Original author of the mod - kittenchilly, and it is supported zriverazrty. The mod has also been fixed by the team LuiAFK Reborn.
Recommendations: Since this may contradict much of what is written in both wikis, it is recommended to use Management for new recipes or Recipe Browserif you prefer it.
Thorium + Calamity Convergence Mod REDUX is a great way to improve your gaming experience if you want to play with both mods at the same time!

name: Automation & Defense
description:
Welcome to the world of incredible automation and defense with the Automation & Defense mod for Terraria. This technology mod is designed to satisfy the passion for automation and is inspired by the Create Mod in Minecraft. Let's plunge into the world of innovation!

Transport System:
	Item Transporter:
		Moves objects by emulating a pipeline system. Easily connects to Funnel for extract/insert as well as Splitter/Merger.
	Item Funnel:
		Acts as an extractor and inserter, depending on the direction of the connected Transporter. Interactive only with chests.
		Ability to set a filter for extraction mode.
	Splitter & Merger:
		Two functions in one. Splitter and combiner in one bottle.
		When exiting in a certain direction:
		If you have a filter installed, the item will preferentially be directed in the appropriate direction, otherwise they will be evenly distributed in all directions.
Automation System:
	Stone Generator:
		Continuously generates stone blocks, directing them to the chest nearby.
	Ore Extractor:
		Extracts ores (...by magic) from stone blocks.
		Required: Pickaxe (power determines which ores can be extracted), input chest with stone blocks, output chest to store ores.
		Possibility of installing a filter so that only specific ore is extracted. Otherwise, all ores are extracted randomly (1% chance per stone block).
Automatic Crafter:
	Periodically creates items.
	Required: Recipe item, associated crafting stations, input chest with ingredients, output chest to store crafted items.
	Items with proximity conditions to water/honey/lava can be crafted for free. Items that require Demon Altar are not supported (unless you have another mod that adds an item to place altars, but I haven't tested).
Wood Cleaner:
	Retrieves wood and sends it to the Wood Harvester Base below. Can be placed on top of each other to create a long line.
Wood Cleaner Base:
	Stores wood from cleaners above it. Sends the wood to the chest next to her.
Item Vacuum:
	Collects items around him and places them in chests on both sides.
	The radius can be increased/decreased.

Defense System:
Magic Tower:
	Automatically picks up bullets from chests near her to shoot nearby enemies. Average speed and low damage.
	Added a new recipe for Musket Ball (requires any iron ingots) so that most bullets in the game can be automated using the Auto Crafter.

name: Nitrate (Performance Optimizer)
description:
Nitrate (Performance Optimizer) is a mod for Terraria created to significantly improve the game's performance by introducing extensive optimizations to various functions. The mod takes advantage of parallelism, SIMD instructions, GPU rendering and other modern technical solutions designed to increase the speed and stability of the gameplay.

Please note:
Nitrate is in early development; Some features may not be compatible with other mods.
Balance between performance and accuracy: We strive to find the perfect balance between game speed and visual fidelity.
Save Security: Your saves should be safe, but visual distortions and glitches may occur.

Main characteristics of the mod:
	Dust particle processing: Rewritten and optimized for GPU, which significantly increases performance (requires testing with modified particles).
	Parallelization of particle update: Increases game speed by simultaneous processing.
	Rain visualization on GPU: optimized so that most of the processing occurs on the video card (may not work correctly with mods that change the textures or color of rain).
	Parallelization of rain update: Increase productivity through more efficient processing.
	Replacing FNA types with SIMD: Important parts of the code now use JIT internal SIMD types to optimize execution.
	Tiled rendering and lighting: rewritten to be chunk-based and partially processed on the GPU (the current version may have bugs, for example, when using spelunker potions).

name: Better Autosave
description:
“Best AutoSave” is a modification for the famous platformer Terraria, created to work with tModLoader. It is an advanced autosave tool that allows players to customize autosave intervals in both single player and multiplayer.

Mod features:
Independent installation on servers and clients.
Single and Multiplayer Configuration:
	In a single player game and on servers, you can set the frequency of autosaving of the world and character (by default, every 10 minutes).
	In multiplayer, the frequency of saving the client character is adjusted (by default, every 5 minutes).
Ability to specify the autosave interval for the world on the server (regardless of the game, where autosave occurs once per game day).
Additional notes:
Single player mode requires the Autosave setting to be enabled in the game settings.
Automatic saving of the world on servers occurs once per game day, despite the mod settings.
The minimum possible autosave interval is 10 seconds, which is due to game stability reasons.

name: Better Treasure Bag Loot
description:
Better Treasure Bag Loot is a mod for tModLoader that optimizes the item drop rates of vanilla Treasure Bags and Master items (pets and mounts) so that you don't have to kill the boss over and over again to get a single reward.

Boss Pets and Mounts:
Drop rate set to 100%
All treasure bags:
Includes the corresponding boss trophy
King Slime Treasure Bag:
Slimy Saddle drop rate set to 100%
The Ninja set will drop entirely
Eye of Cthulhu Treasure Bag:
Most crimtane/demonite ores will drop (87 pieces)
Dirklops Treasure Bag:
The Eye Bone, Eye Umbrella and Radio Item will all drop out entirely.
The above items will be randomly attached to the additional item (for compatibility with other mods)
Wall of Flesh Treasure Bag:
All four emblems will drop in one piece
Emblems will be randomly attached to an additional item (especially for Calamity)
Queen Slime Treasure Bag:
Gelatinous Pillion drop rate set to 100%
Hook of Dissonance drop rate set to 100%
Crystal Assassin Set will drop entirely
Mechanical Boss Treasure Bags:
Most of the hallowed ingots will drop (35 pieces)
Most souls will drop (40 for everyone)
Plantera Treasure Bag:
Thorn Hook drop rate set to 100%
Golem Treasure Bag:
Picksaw drop rate set to 100%
Most beetle shells will drop (23 pieces)
Duke Fishron's Treasure Bag:
Fishron Wings drop rate set to 100%
Empress of Light Treasure Bag:
Empress Wings drop rate set to 100%
Betsy's Treasure Bag:
Betsy's Wings drop rate set to 100%
Most Defender Medals will drop (49 pieces)

name: Fargo's Banner Boost
description:
Fargo's Banner Boost is a unique mod for tModLoader that adds RPG elements that strengthen you against enemies as you defeat them.

Main functions of the mod:
Upon reaching every 50th kill (by default), you gain damage reduction and increased damage against enemies.
At the maximum level of 20, you are completely immune to damage and always kill enemies in one hit.

name: Fargo's Fallen Stars
description:
Fargo's Fallen Stars is a mod for tModLoader that allows you to control how often fallen stars appear.

Main features of the mod:
Setting the spawn frequency: Fargo's Fallen Stars mod allows you to adjust how often fallen stars appear. By default it is set to 2 times faster, but you can set the value from 1 to 500 to achieve the desired result.
Frequency setting name changed: In the new update, the name of the fallen star spawn rate setting has been changed to more accurately describe its function. You can now enter any value (from 1 to 500) without using the slider.
Description updated: The description of the mod has been updated to better reflect its capabilities and features.
Updated workshop image: The mod's image in the Steam Workshop has also been updated to more accurately represent its functionality.

name: In-game Translate
description:
In-game Translate is a mod for tModLoader that provides fast machine translation of text within the game, supporting text added by other mods.

Main functions of the mod:
Quick translation of item hint: The In-game Translate modification allows you to quickly translate item prompts. Now you can easily understand the meaning of objects and their features in your native language.
Automatic translation of chat messages: The mod automatically translates chat messages from other players. Now you can communicate with players in different languages ​​without language barriers.
Several translation services available: The In-game Translate mod provides several APIs for text translation. You can choose the translation service that is most convenient for you.
A free API is available without the need for a key.
Opening the translator via hotkeys: You can open the translator website using hotkeys. The mod suggests using the built-in Steam browser for quick and easy access to the translator.
Automatic detection and translation of selected text: The modification automatically detects and translates text that the mouse is hovering over. Now you can easily understand the meaning of unclear phrases or words.
Translated text cache: The mod stores a cache of translated text, so after restarting the game there is no need to translate the text again.

name: Jojos Caesar Sound
description:
JojosCaesarSound
This mod, named JojosCaesarSound, enhances the gaming experience in Terraria by adding a new sound effect. When a player is hit by a Boulder, the SHIZAAAAAAAAAAAA meme will start playing.

Compatibility
This mod is compatible with tModLoader v2024.1.3.0 and Terraria v1.4.4.9

name: Calamity Mod v2.0.1.3
description:
What is in Calamity Mod
	27 bosses and 12 minibosses
	100+ enemies
	5 city NPCs
	5 biomes and many new buildings
	1 event
	1 new playable class (based on Throwing from Terraria 1.3)
	1800+ items
	700+ weapons
	100+ blocks
	200+ pieces of furniture
	11 ores
	2 full difficulty levels above expert, separate from master
	50+ vanilla mechanic changes
	30+ new vanilla item recipes
	Over 450 tweaks and improvements to vanilla items.
	Cross mod support for Thorium Mod

name: Overhaul v5.0
description:
This is only a beta version of the Overhaul mod for Terraria 1.4 so far, so there are bugs and imperfections. But now you can download the mod and test it. According to the authors of the mod, this version is about 60%+ ready.

What is the Terraria Overhaul mod
This is a huge mod that, instead of adding new content to the game, focuses on adding new game mechanics and completely overhauling existing ones.

name: Bizarre Adventure v0.0.6.1
description:
New version of TBA (Terrarian Bizarre Adventure) mod for Terraria 1.4. Mod (jojo mod) adds stands, abilities and items from the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure universe to Terraria.
Stands that are in fashion:
Star platinum
The World
King Crimson
Aerosmith

name: JoJoStands v0.3.3.1
description: Another one dedicated to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. The sprites here are worse than in Terrarian Bizarre Adventure but still pretty good. The main advantages of the mod are a large number of stands and the fact that their abilities are close to the original source.

name: SGAmod v 3.630
description:
The mod adds new weapons, armor, mechanics and many other interesting content to Terraria. About 20 new bosses alone have been added. If you are tired of killing standard bosses, then this mod can diversify your battles

TModLoader version v0.11.8.6

name: Cheat Panel (Cheat Sheet v0.6.6.4)
description:
New version of "Cheat Mod" for Terraria. If you are not in the know, with this mod you can get any item, spawn enemies, remove debuffs and do a lot of other interesting things.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: SPLIT v 0.4.1.10
description:
The SPLIT mod adds new bosses, biomes, weapons, armor and many other interesting content to Terraria. There are even more bosses, NPCs and items in this new version of the mod.

What's in fashion
~ Over 700 new items - new unique weapons, armor sets, accessories and more! ~
~ Over 40 new enemies with unique animations and behaviors ~
~ 7 new bosses with unique AI ~
~ 6 new city NPCs - each NPC has their own interesting items to sell, and some of them can trade your items for unique gear! ~
~ Two new buildings - Stranded Ship and Underworld Domain! ~
~ Russian language support! ~
~ Support for the Boss Checklist mod by Jopojelly!

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: Calamity v1.5
description:
An update to one of the biggest mods for Terraria. In this version, the developers have added a new difficulty mode - Anger Mode and new mechanics. And also made a lot of changes to the balance of bosses and weapons. In addition, new accessories, weapons, a boss, furniture, ore, and much more were added to the game. You can read more about all the new features of this update at Calamity Mod Wiki.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.5

name: Dancing With The Dragon v0.38
description:
The mod adds summoned dragons to Terraria. According to the developer, dragons are suitable for any class. At the very beginning, you will receive a cub which you can pump into an adult dragon.

What's in fashion
- There are 11 types of young dragons in this version, and they don't have an evolutionary type yet.
- Dragon control stick with four types of damage, sold by the Merchant.
- Dragon Gene Petri Dish is sold by the Merchant and is used to create dragons.
- After defeating the Eye of Cthulhu for the first time, materials for creating dragons will begin to drop in the world.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.6

name: Archery Overhaul Mod v1.0.23
description:
Archery overhaul This is a mod that significantly changes archery in Terraria. In addition to the changes, new bows, accessories, arrows and other things related to archery will be added.

What's in fashion
... 50+ new bows
... 25 new arrows
... 6 new crossbow variants
... 30 new accessories
... 8 equipped quivers with visual effects
... 4 new armor sets
... 15 new materials
... 5 new missile grenades
... 8 new bags of loot
... 1 new NPC
... 1 new potion
... 1 new enemy
... 10+ new recipes for vanilla items

name: Providence 0.1.8.0
description:
Providence is a pretty ambitious mod for Terraria. Now it is at the pre-alpha stage, so a lot of things are not completed yet and there are bugs. But now you can play, look at the new boss, items and other content.

What's in fashion
- One boss
- One new ore
- One new set of items
- One subworld (incomplete)
- New class: Cleric
- New class: Ghost

TModLoader version v0.11.8.5

name: Castled's Equilibrium v0.9.4
description:
Castled's Equilibrium is a mod that adds new bosses, new events and other content to Terraria. The mod is quite small, but those who like to fight with new bosses should like it.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Anarchist mod v1.0.2
description:
Anarchist This is a content mod that adds new bosses, items, new NPCs and many more interesting things to Terraria)

What does the mod add?
-9 new bosses
-1000+ items including
-Multiple new enemies
-3 new city characters
-New class
-New difficulty called Anarchy Mode
-Lunar Lord Post, content with more on the way
-And various changes in the quality of life

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: No Breaking Doors v1.1.0.0
description:
No Breaking Doors is a mod that prevents goblins from breaking doors. Now you can safely use the doors in your buildings and are not afraid that they will be broken.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Exitium Vitae v0.160
description:
A small content mod for Terraria, most of the new items are weapons plus 5 items. The author of Exitium Vitae decided to make his rare and exclusive items drop throughout the game.

What's in fashion
- 20 weapons (6 legendary items, 1 relic item)
- 5 items.

name: Litho's Armory mod v3.1.0.1
description:
Litho's Armory is a content mod geared towards adding new weapons to Terraria. Of course, the mod is not limited to adding weapons only, there are many other interesting items.
What's in fashion
- 639 new weapons and ammunition!
- 4 new accessories!
- 3 new armor sets and 2 new helmets for Shrumite!
- 9 new toiletries!
- 1 new mount!
- 9 new tools!
- 3 new hook!
- 1 new pet!
- 1 new ore!

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Necromanced Bosses v0.4.1
description:
Necromanced Bosses is a content mod that adds new bosses, weapons and NPCs to Terraria. While this mod is quite small, let's hope that the authors continue to work on it and add more content. Plus, it would be nice if the authors worked on improving the sprites.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Sandwich Guy NPC v0.3.1
description:
A small mod that adds a sandwich seller to Terraria. A total of 31 items can be purchased from the vendor (22 Sandwiches and 1 Energy Drink), plus he has a weapon, a Sandwich Guy Toiletry Set, and 3 accessories.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Storm Diver's Mod v1.8.1.1
description:
Content mod that will change vanilla items and add new ones. In total, the author has created over 200 modified items, many of them are created from vanilla items, but modified ingredients have been added to their recipes.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: The Stars Above v0.5.5
description:
The mod adds new content and new Starfarer game mechanics to Terraria. It includes two aspects Umbral and Astral, each of which has its own abilities that you can combine.
A bunch of new weapons, hundreds of dialogues and of course a new boss await you. By the way, The Stars Above is specially adapted and works fine with the mod Calamity.

How the Stars Above mod adapted to Calamity
Several weapons have been specially adapted for the finale after the Moon Lord's Calamity mod, other weapons will be coming soon.
This weapon will have alternate crafting recipes and damage, scalable to the Calamity Mod if installed.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.4

name: Night's Conversion
description:
What is Night's Conversion?
Night's Conversion allows you to use the properties of every sword that went into the Night's Edge. When using Night's Conversion, you can craft 3 new swords, each of which have some relation to one of the swords that went into the Night's Edge. The regular Night's Edge is assumed to be the Light's Bane version for this mod.

What does Night's Conversion add?
The first sword added is the Night's Katana. The Night's Katana has the added ability of autoswing, inherited from the Muramasa. While swinging the sword, monster spawns are also increased, due to the fact that you receive the Water Candle debuff.
The second sword added is the Night's Jungle. The Night's Jungle has the ability to poison enemies on contact, inherited from the Blade of Grass. Unlike the Blade of Grass, the Poisoned debuff is applied 100% of the time and lasts for 3 seconds.
The third sword added is the Night's Flame. The Night's Flame has the ability to burn enemies on contact, inherited from the Fiery Greatsword. The On Fire! debuff is always applied for 3 seconds.

name: Enchanted Nebula
description:
Welcome to Enchanted Nebula, This mod is a simple/basic mod. Nothing drastic has been added or removed.the mod itself simply adds in a few weapons, some joke items, and 1 boss.
The boss at this time can be summoned with a basic item created with dirt. (the recipe will change in the future)

name: Minecraft Swords Mod
description:
This mod adds the iconic swords from Minecraft:
Diamond Sword
Iron Sword
Gold Sword
Stone Sword
Wooden Sword
Netherite Sword

These are overpowered variants that are more of endgame/midgame items that can be crafted from endgame items combined with the respective material (2 diamond and 1 wood and 1 meowmere for 1 diamond sword, for example)

name: Auto Trash
description:
Previously a Cheat Sheet feature, Auto Trash is now a standalone mod. Auto Trash allows you to specify items that clutter your inventory as trash. When such an item is picked up, it automatically goes into the auto-trash slot.
Auto-Trash Slot:
Place items in the Auto-Trash slot to immediately trash them as they are picked up later. Useful for all those items that clutter your inventory.

name: Auto Trash v0.5
description:
Auto Trash is a very useful mod that will make your life in Terraria much easier. You will only need to indicate which resources you do not need, and then when they are extracted, they will automatically be sent to the basket. Especially the mod will come in handy when you have already pumped and will collect a lot of resources.

TModLoader version v0.11.7.5

name: Unknowite v0.4.21
description:
Unknowite is a mod that adds new weapons, armor, enemies and bosses to Terraria. In addition to this, there are other interesting things in the mod, in general, this is a pretty good content mod

What's in the mod:

12 accessories
2 sets of armor
2 ores
3 craft stations
3 pickaxes
21 weapons
4 bosses
1 city NPC
6 enemies without bosses.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: Last Hero's v0.2.4.9
description:
For a long time we have not had mods on our site that add new bosses and enemies to the game. Therefore, I correct this oversight, and add the Last Hero's mod. In addition to bosses and enemies, this mod adds new weapons, items and even a couple of biomes to Terraria.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: No More Tombs v1.1.1
description:
No More Tombs is a simple mod that allows you to disable the appearance of gravestones after the death of a player. In addition, this mod has a couple of interesting settings.

Functions:

Disable the creation of gravestones when the player dies. This effectively prevents tombstones from being received (unless the following feature is enabled).
Enable tombstone creation when city NPCs die, similar to 1.4 Hardcore feature (no need to be in Hardcore for it to work).
Disable the display of messages about the death of a player.
All of the above functions are configured in the game menu Mod Config.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.1

name: Cheat Sheet v0.6.6.3
description:
The author of Cheat Sheet positions his mod as a tool for developers and those who want to play with any objects.
Well, for ordinary players, this is just a cheat menu with which you can get any item from Terraria.
Cheat Sheet now has an item browser, an NPC browser, a recipe browser, and a section where other modders can add their own buttons.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.3

name: Sols Fringe Reborn v0.5
description:
Sols Fringe Reborn is a pretty simple mod that only adds a couple of swords to the game. But if you were looking for new swords, then maybe you will like this mod. By the way, True Sols Fringe can be turned into Terra Blade.

Crafting recipe

Sols Fringe Sword
Blood butcherer
muramasa
Blade of Grass
Fiery greatsword
at Demon Altar.

True Sols Fringe Sword
Sols Fringe
25 Souls of Fright
25 Souls of Sight
25 souls of Might
at Mythril / Orichalcum Anvil.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.1

name: Recipe Browser v0.8.8.1
description:
The recipe browser is one of those mods that will make your life easier when playing Terraria. Indeed, in Terraria there is simply a huge amount of various craft and it is simply impossible to remember all the recipes. Of course, you can use the Internet and wiki games to search for recipes, but this is not convenient.

TModLoader version v0.11.8

name: Boss Checklist v1.1.5.4
description:
Perhaps most Terraria fans know the Boss Checklist mod. But if you are a beginner player then you need to know the following:
The Boss Checklist shows which bosses you have already killed and which one should be killed next. But in addition to the standard bosses of Terraria, the mod also shows bosses from other mods. Which is quite convenient, because there can be a lot of mods and it is often not clear which boss to go next.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.1

name: Supernova Mod v0.1.1.1
description:
Supernova is a content mod that adds these things to Terraria:

Accessories
Armor
Materials
Miscellanea
Potions
Rings
Tiles
Tools
Weapon
And the mod also adds a couple of bosses and 5 new enemies. In general, for a mod that recently came out, there is quite a lot of content in it.

TModLoader version v0.11.8.1

name: Justice for yoyos! v1.1.2.6
description: This mod adds 16 yo-yos and two items to Terraria. If you are a fan of this type of weapon in Terraria then the Justice for yoyos mod! you should like it.

name: The Eldritch v0.1.6
description:
The Eldritch is a mod from the "new content for Terraria" section. This mod is still in the early stages of development, so there is not much content for this. But its author promises to develop The Eldritch, and in the future plans to focus on adding new bosses.

What's in fashion

1 boss,
1 Boss Challenge
2 sets of armor,
6 magic tomes,
1 pair of wings,
3 accessories
and much more!

name: Ravel mod v1.0.3.0
description:
Mod adds new weapons, armor, ore, enemies and bosses to Terraria. As well as a raccoon pet, tools, accessories and even Keanu Reeves)
This is not a joke, the mod does add Keanu Reeves' NPC. You can buy weapons pretty well from him.

name: Awakening Minerals v0.9
description:
The Awakening Minerals is a mod that adds accessories, weapons, armor, pets, NPCs, a boss, and more. All the sprites are well drawn and the mod looks pretty good on the outside.

name: Valhalla mod v0.2.0
description:
The Valhalla mod adds new items, enemies, NPCs and a boss to Terraria. The authors created the mod under the influence of Scandinavian mythology as well as games such as Bomberman, RoR, Dota 2.

Swordstone is a content mod that adds new weapons, enemies and bosses to Terraria. As well as a couple of materials, a pickaxe and other items.

name: Minecraft Paintings Mod v1.0.1
description:
A small mod that adds all the paintings from Minecraft to Terraria. The author manually recreated all 26 paintings. They will definitely come in handy if you decorate your home in Terraria.

tModLoader v0.11.8

name: The Polarities v0.8.1.4
description:
The authors of The Polarities mod focused on adding new bosses to Terraria. At the same time, they emphasize the quality and compliance of the bosses with the vanilla style of play. Now in this mod there are 8 new bosses, new weapons, armor and other items.

Details about bosses

The polarities
A couple of bosses that always remain on opposite sides of the player. They drop several powerful weapons and materials to create a unique set of armor, as well as a useful exclusive accessory for experts. Designed to fight after the golem.
Sun pixie
A giant pixie that bombards the player with lasers and deadly beams. Drops several solar-themed weapons useful for mechanical bosses. Designed to fight up to furs.

Storm Cloudfish
An early rain boss that drops several useful early game accessories and a rain switch. Designed to fight up to EoC.

Eclipxie
A much more difficult version of the Sun Pixie that fought during a solar eclipse. Some of his drops are enhancements to the Sun Pixie drops, while others are more unique. Designed to fight after the golem.

Gigabat
A massive cavern-fighting bat that summons a swarm of minions to defend itself and attack the player. Uniquely, it is triggered by the release of gems (crafted from gems and fireflies) in the cave layer. The more gems are released and the higher the level of the stone from which they are made, the faster the bat will arrive. Designed to fight shortly before the queen bee.

Star construct
The boss is best described as an unholy, screaming mix of Golem, Planter, and a player who has just discovered grappling hooks, designed to fight around the same time as the world evil bosses (World Eater / Brain of Cthulhu). He sometimes falls from the sky while sleeping and can be awakened by hitting him multiple times, although the player can also summon him manually.

Esophage
A boss dedicated to both world disasters unlocks access to an alternate world evil after being defeated, designed to fight around the same time as Plantera. Surprisingly resembles a jumping spider.

Hemorrhage
A much more powerful version of Esophagus that fought during the Blood Moon. Since the original wasn't creepy enough, it has longer and thinner legs. Designed to fight after the golem.

tModLoader v0.11.8
